titleStmt.title: The novelty of the modern Romish religion set forth in an answer to three queries propounded by N.G., priest, with a rejoynder to his reply, and a reply to an answer made to three queries propounded unto him : together with animadversions upon some reflexions made by an unknown author ... / written by S.F., M.A. and vicar of Mitton in Craven.
titleStmt.author: Felgate, Samuel.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Samuel Felgate by Wing.
Imperfect: cropped, stained, defaced, and tightly bound, with print show-through and loss of text.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
